title: Avengers' Paul Rudd's reacts to Coleen Rooney and Rebekah Vardy's war
text:
BREAKING: Paul Rudd knows about #coleenvsrebekah I don't know why this is important but it's definitely important pic.twitter.com/0WWK4R96NT — Tom Olver (@TomOlver1) October 10, 2019

With the entire internet obsessed with the Coleen Rooney and Rebekah Vardy ‘WAGatha Christie’ scandal, the news has even reached the Avengers.

They’ve got some spare time after the release of Endgame, right?

Ant-Man star Paul Rudd got more than he bargained for when comedian Aisling Bea offered a full explanation of the drama.

Seriously, we’ve never seen the man speechless before.

‘Isn’t that brilliant?’ Aisling declared in the interview with NME. ‘That’s top stuff.’

Coleen sent the internet into meltdown with her big reveal (Picture: Getty Images)

However, with Paul mumbling and nodding along, he truly couldn’t look less bothered.

Fans were quick to notice the 50-year-old’s reaction, with one saying: ‘Poor Paul Rudd. He wanted out of there.’

‘Watching Aisling Bea explain the Coleen Rooney / Rebekah Vardy drama to Paul Rudd has just made my evening and also is a sentence I never thought I’d type,’ another added.

‘I didn’t think this coleen vs rebekah situation could get any better until I saw this clip of aisling bea explaining it to paul rudd…day made,’ one more pointed out.

And he’s not the only Hollywood star to be getting the low-down on the drama, after Keira Knightley decided she was up for starring in the (hopefully) upcoming movie.

Asked if she was up to date on all the drama in an interview with Heat magazine, the 34-year-old said she’d heard something on the radio that said the whole furore was the ‘best thing to happen to social media’.

Ain’t that the truth.

Keira was told that there are calls for a film to be made on Rooney vs Vardy and when it was suggested she should play Coleen, the Pirates of the Caribbean star didn’t protest.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘Done,’ she said excitedly.

The internet was sent into meltdown when Coleen revealed that she had purposely set Rebekah up on Instagram to find out whether she was the culprit who had been selling stories on her.

She made up fake stories, including one about the basement in her house being flooded, before accusing her former friend of taking them to the press, presenting her claims in a big reveal that blessed us with the phrase ‘it’s………..Rebekah Vardy’s account.’

Jamie Vardy’s wife denied the claims, firing back in her own statement.

‘As I have just said to you on the phone, I wish you had called me if you thought this,’ 37-year-old Rebekah wrote on Wednesday moments after Coleen released her statement. ‘I never speak to anyone about you as various journalists who have asked me to over the years can vouch for.

‘If you thought this was happening you could have told me and I could have changed my passwords to see if it stopped.

‘Over the years various people have had access to my insta & just this week I found I was following people I didn’t know and have never followed myself.

‘I’m not being funny but I don’t need the money, what would I gain from selling stories on you? I like you a lot Coleen & I’m so upset that you have chosen to do this, especially when I’m heavily pregnant.

‘I’m disgusted that I’m even having to deny this. You should have called me the first time this happened.’
